Test steps:
INITIAL CONDITIONS
1. You must have used the installation of the browser you plan to test.
2. If you have not, browse around some, then come back. Or run the gomenu-list test first.

STEPS/DESCRIPTION
1. Select Go|History.
2. Click the icon on the far right of the column headers.
3. Uncheck two of the items (columns).
4. Recheck an item.
5. Quit and restart the application.

EXPECTED RESULTS
1. Step(2) a popup menu should appear listing all of the column headers as menuitems.
2. Step(3), they should all be checked by default and unchecking should cause that column to disappear from the manage bookmarks window.
3. Step(4), the columns should reappear upon rechecking its name on the list.
4. Step(5) the columns should appear just as the did after step(4).

INITIAL CONDITIONS
Disk and memory caches to be cleared. Write access to test case directory required.

STEPS/DESCRIPTION
1. Copy img-reload.html, foo_master.jpg and bar_master.jpg from the test case directory to your local test case directory.
2. In your test case directory, copy (but do not rename!) foo_master.jpg to foo.jpg
3. View img_reload.html.
4. In the test case directory, copy (but do not rename!) bar_master.jpg to foo.jpg
5. Hold the shift button down, and press the browser's Reload button

EXPECTED RESULTS:
After Step 2, a page should appear containing a picture of John Glenn in a Mercury capsule.
After Step 4, a page should appear containing a picture of a (much older) John Glenn aboard the space shuttle.

LINKS
img-reload.html
bar_master.jpg
foo_master.jpg

STEPS/DESCRIPTION
1. Launch the browser
2. Point and click with the mouse on te grippy at the center of the Sidebar border
3. Clicking once should close the sidebar
4. Again, point with the mouse on the grippy on the left border of the browser window and click the mouse
5. This should open the Sidebar with the original width

EXPECTED RESULTS
Sidebar should open/close properly with grippy
